subject: Primer for Custom Runner ??
msgSnippet: I am trying to enhance JUnitEE to work with Junit 4 but I can t find any good examples of creating a custom runner based on 4.x from end-to- end. Can anyone
messageBody:
I am trying to enhance JUnitEE to work with Junit 4 but I can't find
any good examples of creating a custom runner based on 4.x from end-to-
end. Can anyone directly me to a primer that will help?

I would also be interested in any servlet based runners that have been
developed (couldn't find those either). I know that Junit
is "extendable", but I don't see any clear documentation of what
classes to extend, and how to link them together (and I don't really
have time to walk through all the Junit source).

** btw, No, I'm not trying to test servlets - there are lots of tools
for that, JUnitEE is the only Servlet runner I've ever seen and I want
to run my test within a full J2EE container (no mocks). Unfortunately
no-one has updated that project for 4.x.

TIA
